description: Variation of conditions 3 and 4, development built in accordance with approved drawings and conditions 9 and 10 (driveway) to allow: Narrowed building (by 300mm);Removal of lower ground floor access and associated structures; New main access to building at ground floor level and revised floor layout;Narrowed site access;of Full Planning Permission reference 19/1545 dated 3 July, 2019, for Demolition of existing shed and construction of a two bedroom, two storey dwellinghouse consisting of a part-basement ground floor and first floor, with associated landscaping, parking, and refuse/cycle storage.
ward: Kensal Green - WARD NO LONGER EXISTS
site_name: Building and land rear of 1 The Tudors, Harlesden Road, London
